biotools.summary: A resource for the comparison of fragments found in metabolites, drugs or toxic compounds. We generated 35,000 different building blocks (fragments), which are not only relevant to their biosynthesis and degradation but also provide important information regarding side-effects and toxicity. It provides a variety of search options. Various analysis tools have been implemented including the calculation of amino acid preferences of fragments binding sites and classification of fragments.

bioschemas.name: FragmentStore
